alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 501 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Wittmann to Glendale to Scottsdale Airport to near Four Peaks. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Apache Junction, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell and Laveen. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 115 and 163. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 222. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
